options.dmc.title: Definitely My Coords
tooltip.dmc.mode-vanilla: Doesn't modify your position at all.
tooltip.dmc.mode-relative: Changes your position to x, y and z.
tooltip.dmc.mode-absolute: Changes 0 0 0 to x, y and z.
tooltip.dmc.mode-custom: Changes your position upon opening F3 to 0 0 0.
tooltip.dmc.obscure-rotations: Modify block rotations to hide your real position.
tooltip.dmc.offset-x: Sets x to the input if it's a number.
tooltip.dmc.offset-y: Sets y to the input if it's a number.
tooltip.dmc.offset-z: Sets z to the input if it's a number.
tooltip.dmc.redo-rotations: Changes the modifier for random rotations.
tooltip.dmc.biome: If empty does nothing. Otherwise spoofs biome to entered value.
